org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.exist
Class AeExistConnectionPool

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.exist.AeExistConnectionPool
public class AeExistConnectionPool
extends java.lang.Object

Implements a connection pool for the test in-memory database. This connection pool is, by default, limited to a single connection.

Nested Class Summary
protected  class AeExistConnectionPool.AeCheckedOutConnectionInfo
          An inner class that holds information about a connection that has been checked out of the pool.
protected  class AeExistConnectionPool.AePooledExistConnection
          When closed, returns the connection to the pool.
